sourcesContent:
import Button from "./Button.js"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import "./styling/ExcursionInfoCSS.css" import {excursionList} from "../App.js" const ExcursionInfo = ({ excursion, excursionDetails, excursionIndex }) => { // console.log(excursion); const pathname = "/cart" + excursionDetails.path; return (

{excursionList[excursionIndex].Name}

Cost: ${excursion[excursionIndex].Cost}

Duration: {excursion[excursionIndex].Duration} Hours

Months: {excursion[excursionIndex].Months}

Max. Participants: {excursion[excursionIndex].MaxParticipants}

{excursionDetails.description}

) } export default ExcursionInfo
